definition: to be filthy, i.e. (intensively) to loathe, pollute
kjvTranslation: abhor, make abominable, have in abomination, detest, [idiom] utterly.

translations.bg: мръсен, т.е. (в интензивен смисъл) отвратителен, мръсен
translations.cs: být špinavý, tj. (intenzivně) hnusit se, znečišťovat se
translations.da: at være beskidt, dvs. (intensivt) at afsky, forurene
translations.el: να είναι βρώμικος, δηλαδή (έντονα) να απεχθάνεται, να μολύνει
translations.es: estar sucio, es decir (intensivamente) aborrecer, contaminar
translations.hu: mocskosnak lenni, azaz (intenzíven) utálni, szennyezni, szennyezni
translations.id: menjadi kotor, yaitu (secara intensif) membenci, mencemari
translations.it: essere sporco, cioè (in senso intensivo) detestare, inquinare
translations.ja: 不潔にする、すなわち（集中的に）嫌悪する、汚す
translations.lt: būti purvinas, t. y. (intensyviai) bjaurėtis, teršti
translations.nb: å være skitten, dvs. (intensivt) å avsky, forurense
translations.pt: ser imundo, ou seja, (intensivamente) detestar, poluir
translations.ro: a fi murdar, adică (intensiv) a detesta, a polua
translations.sk: byť špinavý, t. j. (intenzívne) hnusiť sa, znečisťovať
translations.sv: att vara smutsig, dvs. (intensivt) att avsky, förorena
translations.tr: pis olmak, yani (yoğun olarak) iğrenmek, kirletmek
translations.zh: 污秽，即（密集地）厌恶、污染
